references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..n, sum(r=0..n/2-k, binomial(n,2*r+k)*(stirling1(n-2*r-k,k)*sum(i=0..k/2, (2*i-k)^(2*r+k)*binomial(k,i)*(-1)^(r+k-i))))/2^(k-1)), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 01 2011]|a(n)| ~ n! * n^(sin(1)-1)/Gamma(sin(1)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 27 2013
author: _Simon Plouffe_
